title: K-12 Science Lesson Design and Operation Using Remote Education Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and general digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Training for prospective science teachers or science education assistants focusing on applying remote education technologies to actual science classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can design science laboratory classes using remote education platforms (Zoom, Google Classroom, etc.).
Learners can create asynchronous learning materials (videos, quizzes, discussion boards) to promote self-directed learning.
Learners can demonstrate measurable improvements in understanding through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
